activities:
We may collect the following personal information:

Contact Information such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number.
Information about your business such as company name, company size, business type.
Unique Identifiers such as user name, account number, password.
Information about your broker accounts, investments and personal holdings.

We use this information to:

Administer accounts.
Provide services.
Respond to customer service requests.
Meet the relevant compliance responsibilities of the firm.
Assess the needs of your business to determine suitable products.
Send requested product or service information.
Send newsletters.
Respond to question and concerns.
Improve our website and marketing efforts.

We will share personal information with third parties only in the ways that are described in the privacy policies. We may transfer personal information to companies that help us provide our Services. We do not sell personal information to third parties.

We will retain personal data on behalf of our clients for as long as an account is active or as needed to provide services.  We will retain and use the information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
